name: wizard-world
description: ## Background: **wizard world** is a game that follows a young wizard in his journey to defeat evil enemies and restore peace to the wizarding world. The player starts out in the center of the map and can move around using their arrow keys. Enemies will spawn from entrance points on the sides of the map. The player can use their WASD keys to shoot bullets in the corresponding directions. The goal of each level is to stay alive until the time runs out.
